New Records: Yashasvi Jaiswal broke Rohit Sharma's 13-year-old T20I record by scoring 75-plus runs.
Yashasvi Jaiswal became the youngest Indian batsman to post 75-plus runs in a T20I match.
Key Match Events: Yashasvi Jaiswal and Shubman Gill formed a 165-run partnership for the first wicket.
India won the match by 9 wickets, their highest margin of victory in a T20I match so far.
Yashasvi Jaiswal was named Man of the Match for his unbeaten 84-run innings.
Post-Match Reflections: Yashasvi Jaiswal's performance was praised as a promising sign for Indian cricket's future.
The win leveled the series 2-2 and kept India's hopes alive for a series victory.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was notable for the third-highest partnership in India's T20I history.
India's victory against the West Indies was their sixth-largest win in terms of wickets in T20Is.
